shortDescription.value: Turn up the heat with 6 for $6.95 Hot & Crispy™ Boneless! A succulent six pack of chicken in a spicy coating, this deal is so hot it’ll make you say, “Shut up and take my money!” Not everywhere and not forever.

longDescription.value: Turn up the heat with 6 for $6.95 Hot & Crispy™ Boneless! A succulent six pack of chicken in a spicy coating, this deal is so hot it’ll make you say, “Shut up and take my money!” Not everywhere and not forever.

content.longDescription: Get more for your buck and add Regular Chips and a Regular Drink for just $4. Not everywhere and not forever. Pick up only.
Golden, thick-cut chips sprinkled with our signature seasoning to leave you wanting more… no wonder they’re Australia’s best tasting chips. Yeah, we went there.
